lead_paragraph: I guess it was starting to dawn on Mitt Romney that he really put his well-shod foot into his mouth when he announced on CNN this morning that he is "not concerned about the very poor." During a press gaggle later in the day, Mr. Romney clarified: "No no no no. No no." Six no's are more emphatic than one.

headline.main: Romney Spins His Remarks on the Poor, Poorly
